# Charandeep Kapoor

> Personal portfolio – crypto, quant finance, and mathematics expert. 6+ years across product, research, and VC in crypto & stock markets. Building products 0→1. Creator of Stocky AI (Claude-powered Zerodha trading, 100%+ ROI). Essays on trading psychology, markets, protected perps, DeFi, and building systems.

## About

Charandeep Kapoor is a crypto and quantitative finance expert with 6+ years of experience. Creator of Stocky AI, a Claude-powered Zerodha trading system with 100%+ ROI and 73% win rate. Writes on protected perpetuals, DeFi mechanics, trading psychology, AI, and life philosophy. Expert in algorithmic trading, blockchain, mathematical finance.

## Main Pages

- [Home](https://charandeepkapoor.com/): Portfolio – crypto, quant, financial tools, experience, research papers
- [Writings](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/): Essays on crypto, quant trading, protected perps, DeFi, markets, AI, life philosophy

## Essays (Protected Perps Series)

- [Why I Built Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/why-perps): Helping gamblers gamble better – no liquidation, maximum leverage
- [How I Would Build Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/perps-pm-design): PM/designer perspective – two platforms for sophisticated vs mass users
- [Speedrun Money from Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/extract-money): Monetization strategy, extraction vs value
- [What Next After Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/perps-next): Roadmap and future of protected perps
- [Protected Perps: A Novel Payoff](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/perps-payoff): Core payoff structure explained
- [Life Is Exchange of Payoffs](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/exchange-payoffs): Conceptual foundation
- [Everything Has a Price: LPs & ETH Downside](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/lps-downside): LP economics
- [Web2 Equivalent of Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/web2-perps): Traditional finance analog
- [Clubs, Wagers, Costs: Protected Perps](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/clubs-perps): Mechanism design

## Other Essays

- [HYPE Trade](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/hype-trade): 27/60 Hyperliquid call spread — 4.5x risk-reward, defined risk, December 2025 expiry
- [Why AI Can't Replace a Genius](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/ai-genius): AI and human creativity
- [Why Traders Like Losing](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/traders-losing): Trading psychology
- [Order of Things: Money First](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/money-first): Priorities
- [Power Law, Average, Waste](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/power-law-waste): Power laws in life and markets

## My VC Journey

- [My VC Journey](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/vc-motivations): Why I chose VC — front-row seat to the future, exceptional people, highest-leverage game
- [The Future](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/the-future): Bets on AI, capitalism, social media, demographics, biotech, green energy, crypto
- [My Ideal Company](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/my-ideal-company): Philosophy and ethics for building a company — incentive alignment, first principles, hiring for talent
- [How to Pitch to Me](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/how-to-pitch): Six things I need to see before I write a cheque — why this, why now, why you, evidence, use of funds, unfair advantage

## RSS & Tools

- [RSS Feed](https://charandeepkapoor.com/blog/feed.xml): Subscribe to writings
- [Stocky AI](https://stockai-red.vercel.app): Claude-powered Zerodha trading system
